issue.title: Segfault when running example_sig.c
issue.body:
Hello,

I was trying the library for the first time and I'm getting a segmentation fault when trying to run [this example](https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs/wiki/Minimal-example-of-a-post-quantum-signature).

Here is the bt:
```
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
(gdb) bt
#0  0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
#1  0x00007ffff7bc3a58 in ?? () from /usr/lib/liboqs.so.2
#2  0x00007ffff7bc44c2 in ?? () from /usr/lib/liboqs.so.2
#3  0x00007ffff792c47e in pqcrystals_dilithium2_avx2_pointwise_acc_avx () from /usr/lib/liboqs.so.2
#4  0x00007ffff7931e93 in pqcrystals_dilithium2_avx2_nttunpack_avx () from /usr/lib/liboqs.so.2
#5  0x0000555555555280 in example_stack ()
#6  0x00005555555556f9 in main ()
```

I build liboqs 0.7.2 with these options (for more details check [this PKGBUILD](https://aur.archlinux.org/cgit/aur.git/tree/PKGBUILD?h=liboqs) for Arch Linux):
```
cmake -G Ninja -B build -S "${pkgname}-${pkgver}"\
        -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS='ON' \
        -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE='None' \
        -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="${pkgdir}/usr" \
        -DOQS_BUILD_ONLY_LIB='OFF' \
        -DOQS_DIST_BUILD='ON' \
        -DOQS_USE_AES_OPENSSL='ON' \
        -DOQS_USE_SHA2_OPENSSL='ON' \
        -DOQS_USE_SHA3_OPENSSL='ON' \
        -DOQS_OPT_TARGET='generic' \
        -Wno-dev
```
And I'm using have glibc 2.36. Please let me know anything else I could do to help debug this issue. I will try to build liboqs with `CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE='Debug'`.
